positive_examples: This is an example of koala.
We observed koala in this context.
A typical case of koala would involve these features.
The concept of koala applies here.
An arboreal marsupial native to Australia that primarily feeds on eucalyptus leaves.
negative_examples: This is an example of kangaroo, not koala.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Kangaroo, or other types of Marsupial

definition: An arboreal marsupial native to Australia that feeds primarily on eucalyptus.
